dcterms:description: A human-generated dataset designed for machine reading comprehension, containing passages and questions to evaluate retrieval models.
dcterms:title: MS MARCO Passage Retrieval collection

dcterms:creator: Navid Rekabsaz
Simone Kopeinik
Markus Schedl
dcterms:description: A dataset that focuses on societal biases in retrieved content, providing a framework for measuring and mitigating biases in ranking models.
dcterms:title: MS MARCOFair

dcterms:creator: Navid Rekabsaz
Markus Schedl
dcterms:description: Scores that quantify the neutrality of gender representation in retrieved documents, used to assess and mitigate gender bias in ranking models.
dcterms:title: Gender bias neutrality scores
